Class ChatroomManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChatroomManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ChatroomManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Stores all Chatrooms in the program, deals with adding new Chatrooms and sending messages.
    Author:
    Elliot, Chrisee
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      ChatroomManager()
      Constructor for Chatroom, creates new empty HashMap.

                            java.lang.String recipient)

        Parameters:
        user - Username of one of the users
        recipient - Username of the other user
        Returns:

      • getAllChatrooms

        public java.util.HashMap<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>,Chatroom> getAllChatrooms(java.lang.String username)
        Get method for all chatrooms that involve a specific user.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the user
        Returns:
        HashMap of all Chatrooms involving user, with list of usernames as keys and chatroom as values
